title: S3 Support LF Rank Duo
body:
Hi guys, i'm looking for a duo pref an Adc but we can chat figure something out, at first we can either norms or do flex to build synergy then move onto duo rank, im B2 on flex at the moment.

the times i can normally play are 9:30am til 5pm then 9:30pm Til about 2am AEDT

I prefer to support as sona but can also sup as :- 
nami
soraka
leo
poppy
naut
and more, i'm happy to pick up supps for the right adc ;)

replies.body:
Can play all role pretty good mainly focused on adc and jg this and last season
Owned all champs 

ADC i play in order {{champion:81}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:51}} {{champion:22}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:236}} 
Can play all other champs aswell but these are pref picks
Yo i'm a s3 AD Main / jng off role feel free to add me if ur keen

Hey I've been looking for someone to duo with on a regular basis, I'm currently only B4 and a dirty teemo main but was adc main last season and comfortable on all champs. Add me if your keen to chat and play some norms to see how it goes {{champion:17}}
